data.title: Amir Johnson Named D-League Performer of the Week
data.meta_description: Amir Johnson of the Sioux Falls Skyforce/Detroit Pistons is the D-League Performer of the Week for March 5, 2007. He is the second NBA-assigned player to be named Performer of the Week during the 2006-07 season. Johnson was assigned to Sioux Falls on Monday for the second time this season and led the Skyforce to a 3-1 record in his first four games. The second year pro started his second D-League stint of the season on Tuesday with 32 points, 13 rebounds and five blocks in a win over Fort Worth.
